document_data.name: Wyrran Alastrarra
document_data.mainbody: '''Wyrran Alastrarra''' was the mate of Countess [[Sarya Dlardrageth]] in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Wyrran was the most recent mate of Sarya.
document_data.History:
Wyrran hailed from [[Evermeet]] but was exiled for trafficking with [[fiend]]s a century before. He went to [[Luskan]] and joined the [[Arcane Brotherhood]].

Wyrran was then captured by the [[daemonfey]] together with some members of the [[Company of the Jaded Heart]]. Interesting in the breeding experiments conducted by Sarya Dlardrageth, Wyrran plotted to be formally adopted into [[House Dlardrageth]] and become Sarya's consort.
